actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: To amend the Anti-Drug Abuse Act of 1988 to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1995, 1996, and 1997 for drug abuse education and prevention for the benefit of youth.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services
Federal aid to child health services
Treatment and rehabilitation of narcotic addicts

summary.text: Amends the Anti-Drug Abuse Act of 1988 to authorize appropriations for FY 1995 through 1997 for drug education and prevention programs relating to youth gangs and for programs for runaway and homeless youth.

titles.title: To amend the Anti-Drug Abuse Act of 1988 to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1995, 1996, and 1997 for drug abuse education and prevention for the benefit of youth.
